fastjet
=======


A software package for jet finding in pp and e+e- collisions

https://fastjet.fr/
# Available modules


The overview below shows which fastjet installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using fastjet, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load fastjet/3.4.2-gompi-2023a
```
